message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and we can move on.
That's a tough start, Alice! How about we try a more even split this time? My turn to be generous.
Okay, I'll take 60%, but that's my final offer.  We're losing money with each round.
Come on, Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'll meet you in the middle - 60/40 seems fair with the time crunch.
